snippet: The State Department announced that it was offering rewards for information leading to the location of the leaders of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb.
abstract: State Department announces it is offering rewards for information leading to location of leaders of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb, as well as other terrorist organizations operating in North and West Africa.
lead_paragraph: The State Department announced that it was offering rewards for information leading to the location of the leaders of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb.

headline.main: State Department Offers Rewards for Terrorist Leaders
headline.print_headline: State Department Offers Rewards for Terrorist Leaders

keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb
